name: ChallengeAmerica
0:
”Alexa Open Challenge America”
”Alexa Start Challenge America”
”Alexa Play Challenge America”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: challenge america
des:
*** To enable this game you must say: "Alexa, ENABLE, Challenge America". ***

There are 2 ways to play Challenge America:

1 – SINGLE PLAYER – where you have to give 10 correct answers in a row to win a game, and get to compete on the Global Leader Board.

2 – MULTI-PLAYER – where up to 6 players in the same room can play against each other.

Categories include: 
• Who Am I?
• Famous Quotations
• Hollywood Questions

Some questions are easy and some questions are hard.

Frequently Asked Questions.
-------------------------------------
Q – Do the scores and ranks on the Leader Board include every Challenge America player in the world?
A – Yes. The Leader Board is a Global Leader Board, covering ALL Challenge America players, wherever they are in the world.

Q – Is the Leader Board real time?
A – Yes. The Leader Board is updated continuously, in real time, so you always get the latest information.

Q - Even though I won a game, my rank stayed the same, or went down! How is that even possible?
A – This can happen if players above you break away from sharing their score with other players. For example, let’s say 2 players above you on the Leader Board share the same score. They will be in joint place. However, if one of them increases their score then they will no longer share a score and instead of there being just one joint place above you there will be 2 separate places above you, and so you’ll be pushed down the rankings.

Q - How can I pause a game?
A - You can pause an existing game by saying "STOP". When you restart Challenge America the game will continue from where you left off. 

Q - How can I return to the Challenge America Main Menu?
A - Just say “Start New Game”.

Q - How can I get a mistake in one of the questions corrected?
A - Please contact me via the methods below.

Feedback
-------------
I hope you’ll love Challenge America. 
However, if you have spotted any mistakes, or have any issues, please let me know on the "Challenge America" Facebook page, or by e-mail at animal.letters@gmail.com
I'll always do my best to resolve your issue - but if you don't contact me using one of these methods I cannot respond to you.

More games?
------------------
Why not try:
“Alexa open THE Daily Question”
“Alexa open Feel the Pressure”
"Alexa open Face the Music"
“Alexa open Hocus Pocus”
“Alexa open Stinky Pinky”
“Alexa open Animal Letters”
“Alexa open Name Letters”

“Alexa open Monster Madness”

"Alexa open Scary Monster"
"Alexa open the Daily Connection"
